item.description: This class teaches the basics for club dancing, whether it's to 70s music or current Hustle tunes. Cha-cha has that distinctive latin triple step, danced to Santana and Michael Buble. No Partner Necessary. Wear comfortable clothes. 5 weeks beginning Oct. 12, 2011; $50/person $95/couple(cash or check please) Oct. 12, 19, 26, Nov. 2, 9, 2011 Classes located at: Branford High School 185 E. Main St. Branford, CT 06405 To register, call 203.641.0691
item.how_to_find_us: Go through the front door and ask the security person.
item.name: HUSTLE & CHA-CHA -all levels
